name: MoPub-Fyber-Adapters
summary: Fyber Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Banner, Interstitial, Rewardedvideo

To download and integrate the Fyber SDK, please check this tutorial: https://developer.fyber.com/hc/en-us/articles/360010915618-Integrating-the-iOS-SDK. 


For inquiries and support, please utilize the support page: https://www.fyber.com/.
